text: Englewood Cliffs is a borough in Bergen County, New Jersey, United States. As of the 2020 census, 5,342 people lived here.QuickFacts Englewood Cliffs borough, New Jersey, United States Census Bureau. Accessed January 24, 2023.Total Population: Census 2010 - Census 2020 New Jersey Municipalities, New Jersey Department of Labor and Workforce Development.
